general-knowledge.question: What is the capital of France?
general-knowledge.explanation: Paris is the capital city of France.

general-knowledge.question: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
general-knowledge.explanation: Mars is known as the Red Planet due to its reddish appearance.

general-knowledge.question: Who wrote the national anthem of India?
general-knowledge.explanation: Rabindranath Tagore wrote the Indian national anthem 'Jana Gana Mana'.

general-knowledge.question: In which year did India become a republic?
general-knowledge.explanation: India became a republic on January 26, 1950.

general-knowledge.question: What is the smallest bone in the human body?
general-knowledge.explanation: The stapes bone in the ear is the smallest bone in the human body.

general-knowledge.question: Who is known as the 'Missile Man of India'?
general-knowledge.explanation: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam earned the title for his work in missile technology.

general-knowledge.question: Which element has the atomic number 92?
general-knowledge.explanation: Uranium has the atomic number 92 in the periodic table.

general-knowledge.question: Which is the longest river in Asia?
general-knowledge.explanation: The Yangtze River is the longest river in Asia.

general-knowledge.question: Which Nobel laureate discovered the neutron?
general-knowledge.explanation: James Chadwick discovered the neutron in 1932.
